DOC.brief_summary: Impaired cerebral function remain important complication cardiopulmonary bypass ( CPB ) cardiac surgery . The aim present study investigate whether lactate pyruvate ( LP ) ratio obtain microdialysis ( MD ) cerebral venous outflow reflect derangement global cerebral energy state cardiopulmonary bypass .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergoing primary , elective coronary artery bypass graft blindly randomize usual range MAP ( 40 60 mmHg ; n = 5 ) intervention group MAP ( 60 80 mmHg ; n = 5 ) CPB . MD catheter position retrograde direction internal jugular vein reference catheter insert brachial artery . The relation LP ratio , MAP , data obtain bi-frontal NIRS neurological outcome measure assess .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Elective CABG CPB Exclusion criterion : Acute patient reoperations Patients epidural catheter Previous stroke Stenotic carotids Ejection fraction ( EF ) < 50 % Estimated per operative risk > 5 %
